column1: ;飛具弱点、Fire・Ice・Force・呪殺耐性、電撃吸収。ぶっちゃけ魔法に強いってことですよね。

column3: 1810;ダムドーラ(魔神Ⅱギガ系の代替)

column1: ;初期衣装　ブラジャーつけてないようにしか見えない

column3: As the secretary of Goto、she is the staff officer of the secret coup d'etat plot。
While wearing a tight suit、she is a woman with a bewitching atmosphere。
She is actually Lilith、who planned to later become the partner of the hero。
But because she was not able to do so、she changed her form and curried favor with the chaos hero。
Still、the setting in which she is Goto's secretary is the TRPG。
The Goto that is Lieutenant General in that world、Yuriko has the surname Rosenberg。
